elements.text:
A friend tells a funny joke and you start to laugh really hard. While you're laughing, you feel an uncomfortable tightness in your chest that you've never felt before. 

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

text: I feel very connected to my friend.
I'm really scared about what this feeling means.
I'm anxious that this feeling means something's wrong with me, but I know it's probably from laughing really hard.
I'm nervous about why my chest is tight, but then remind myself that this is normal.
I love it when my friends make me laugh.
